misalignments.reasoning: Spec requires endpoint POST /api/auth/register, but code implements POST /api/auth/signup
Spec requires button text 'Add Task' for task creation, but code displays 'Create'
Spec requires completion percentage label as 'Completion percentage', but code displays 'Progress'
Spec requires landing page with Google Analytics scripts, but this is not specified in the requirements (Extra feature - Type 3)

Spec requires Tailwind CSS standard v3 configuration, but code extends theme with custom CSS variables (border, input, ring, background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, muted, accent, popover, card)
